title: Hammerhead Adds Native Extension Library on Karoo for 3rd party Apps
content:
Hammerhead just announced the addition of a Native Extension Library on Karoo. The new library will allow Karoo computer users to customize their computers further with third-party apps, improving the connected rider experience. The Extention Library enables the rider to install third-party apps, directly from the bike computer.

“The launch of the Hammerhead Extension Library is a culmination of the original vision for our devices. Building on Android enables third parties to make their apps seamlessly available on Karoo and create Extensions that add meaningful value to our mutual riders. We strongly believe in the power of the cycling community, and the Extension Library allows us to solve problems together, whether they are a large brand or a developer who is a passionate cyclist working on a side project. We are excited to continue working with the community to add more third-party apps to the Extension Library in the coming months and years ahead,” said Jess Braun, Hammerhead Category Director

Apps Now Available

As of March 6th, 2025, the following applications are now available on Hammerhead devices.

  • Epic Ride Weather
    This app provides weather forecasts that can be personalized by taking into account your speed and location. It combines multiple forecasts and gives the rider a precise projection of the weather for the duration of the ride.
  • GiBLI Tech Inc.
    Using real-time aerodynamic sensors, this app helps cyclists and triathletes reach their ultimate performance potential.
  • hDrop Hydration
    hDrop provides real-time sweat monitoring and delivers instant data on sweat loss, rate, and electrolyte levels.
  • HR2VP by BIPR
    HR2VP is a cycling app that estimates power based on heart rate and sends the info to your computer.
  • myWindsock
    This app will provide helpful and insightful weather data to the sporting community using signature Iconic Wind Lines
  • VinApp
    VinApp and Vin-HKE offer a load of solutions for the Karoo. From custom alerts to color data fields and workouts.

The App Founders & CEOS are Happy You Can Now Use Their Apps:

Gregory Cordier, CEO HR2VP by BIPR

“The extension library is the major update I’ve been waiting for. It offers countless opportunities for developers to add custom data, such as calories and real-time power based on heart rate with HR2VP. The Hammerhead development team is highly responsive and values partner suggestions, which is truly appreciated!”

David Green, Founder Epic Ride Weather

“The Hammerhead Karoo is a uniquely powerful cycling computer built on Android, which enables developers to extend its capabilities using standard tools and languages. With the new extensions API, third-party apps like Epic Ride Weather can integrate seamlessly, bringing innovative new features directly to riders.” 

Mark Ernsting, GiBLI Tech CEO

“The Karoo is a perfect platform for our G10 sensor as it has the full capability of our app. This allows current Karoo owners the chance to add our G10 sensor as a plug-and-play system and our current and future G10 users the option to have a fully integrated cycling head unit to control their G10 sensor.”

Ben Norbury, Founder myWIndsock

“I’m really pleased to see myWindsock data featured live in-ride for the first time on Hammerhead devices. It’s a great step forward in bringing real-time weather and aerodynamic insights directly to riders, helping them make smarter decisions on the road.”

Extension Library Details

The Extension Library is easily accessed from the launcher page on your Karoo. Just open the Extensions folder to select an app you want to install. When updates are made available for the app, the user can go back to the app details page in the Extension Library and update the app. W 

Hammerhead will be releasing additional accessibility updates in the coming months with the addition of more third-party apps.
